dict.acceptation: 必要的；强制的；必然的；不可避免的；

sent.orig: He was so necessary, strange though, how the most necessary characters can be dismissed so easily.
sent.trans: 他是多么必不可少啊；可是奇怪，最最必不可少的人物竟又是那么容易置之脑后。

sent.orig: When it is not necessary to change, it is necessary not to change.
sent.trans: 改变无必要，不须去改变。

sent.orig: Check detector seals, and replace as necessary. Clean or replace detector jets as necessary.
sent.trans: 检查检测器密封垫，如有必要就替换。如有必要清洗或替换检测器喷嘴。

sent.orig: Actually, language is not all that necessary; love is the most necessary.
sent.trans: 事实上，语言并非那么必要，[爱]才是不可或缺的。

sent.orig: You must bring all necessary relevant documents necessary to the audition.
sent.trans: 试镜当天，参赛者必须携带填妥的参赛表格以及所需的有关文件。
